DOC.brief_title: Topical Challenge With Omiganan Imiquimod Healthy Volunteers
DOC.criteria: Healthy male female subject , 18 45 year age , inclusive . Healthy status define absence evidence active chronic disease follow detailed medical surgical history , complete physical examination include vital sign , 12lead ECG , haematology , blood chemistry , blood serology urinalysis . Body mass index ( BMI ) 18 30 kg/m2 , inclusive , minimum weight 50 kg . Fitzpatrick skin type IIII ( Caucasian ) Subjects partner childbearing potential must use effective contraception , duration study 3 month last dose . Able willing give write informed consent comply study restriction . Any disease associate immune system impairment , include autoimmune disease , HIV transplantation patient Family history psoriasis History pathological scar formation ( keloid , hypertrophic scar ) Have current / recurrent pathologically , clinical significant skin condition . Previous use imiquimod/ resiquimod/ gardiquimod Known hypersensitivity ( non ) investigational drug , drug class , excipients . Hypersensitivity dermatological marker screen Requirement immunosuppressive immunomodulatory medication within 30 day prior enrollment plan use course study . Use topical medication ( prescription overthecounter [ OTC ] ) within 30 day study drug administration , less 5 halflives ( whichever longer ) local treatment area Tanning due sunbathing , excessive sun exposure tan booth within 3 week enrollment . Participation investigational drug device study within 3 month prior screen 4 time year .
